definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The candidate's campaign was attended with too much ballyhoo .
sentences.chinese: 這個候選人的競選活動致力於太多的大舉造勢。

sentences.english: Mr. Ayers is not involved in my campaign.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾斯沒有參與我的任何競選活動。

sentences.english: The man threw leaflets for a write-in campaign for mayor before police pulled him up and arrested him.
sentences.chinese: 這名男子一直在朝下扔傳單，爲市長的競選活動造勢。

sentences.english: The associated chairman that she is financial committee of electioneering whole nation of collect Mu Buddhist nun at present.
sentences.chinese: 她現在是羅姆尼競選活動全國財務委員會的聯合主席。

sentences.english: But some map-based campaigns have already produced clear results.
sentences.chinese: 但一些使用地圖的競選活動已經取得了可喜的結果。

sentences.english: The candidate kicked off his campaign with a speech on television.
sentences.chinese: 該候選人由電視演講開始了他的競選活動。

sentences.english: About four months out of six, the Senator is away politicking.
sentences.chinese: 六個月中約有四個月，這位參議員外出參加競選活動。

sentences.english: Much of the alleged bribery was connected to fund-raising efforts in recent election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 據稱這些賄金的大部分都和近來競選活動的籌資有關。

sentences.english: They claimed his campaign had been bankrolled with drug money.
sentences.chinese: 他們聲稱他的競選活動是由販毒資金支持的。
家庭主婦在電器行進行競選活動。

sentences.english: His election campaign was bankrolled by the Mafia .
sentences.chinese: 他的競選活動有黑手黨的財務資助。

sentences.english: Obama took his campaign to Beaverton, Oregon, on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬星期五在俄勒岡的比弗頓展開競選活動。

sentences.english: Barack Obama 's election celebration resonated Tuesday all the way to the weight room at AmericanAirlines Arena.
sentences.chinese: 週二奧巴馬的競選活動讓美航中心所有道路都封鎖了。

sentences.english: In 1997 Mr Roh organised Mr Kim's successful presidential campaign.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，盧爲金大中成功的組織了總統競選活動。

sentences.english: In the campaign, Obama was that commonality.
sentences.chinese: 在競選活動中，奧巴馬就是共性。

sentences.english: Sata’s campaign this year was only slightly less confrontational.
sentences.chinese: 今年，Sata的競選活動對抗意識稍微減輕了一些。

definition: (of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
